markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Diomazul (The Serpent of Eighty Blades)](/Deities.aspx?ID=190)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 314, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

An obscure Vudran god of war, Diomazul, the Serpent of Eighty Blades, is a patron of ascetic meditation, bitter renewals, and inordinate retribution. Devotees and theologians speak of Diomazul as having the likeness of a massive, hooded cobra in serene slumber—80 arms folded in stillness comprise this hood, each hand grasping a sheathed blade. When roused to violence by enemies, Diomazul awakens, retaining his tranquil countenance, but his hood flares in a bristle of steel as he draws all 80 blades to welcome his newfound foes and offer a gift of their unmaking. Once the Serpent of Eighty Blades has concluded evicting the life from his enemies, he entwines his body around their remains, crushing their bones into the earth and scattering their blood into the waters, burying all spoor of their existence under his immense form.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Remain celibate and detached from worldly pleasures, meditate, utterly destroy your enemies, erase all traces of defeated foes

**Anathema** Provoke a fight, give mercy to anyone who provokes a fight with you

**Area of Concern**
austerity, retribution, war

**Follower Alignments**
LN, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Deities/Diomazul.png" />
</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Dexterity

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=10), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220)

- **2nd**
[Slough Skin](/Spells.aspx?ID=589)

- **4th**
[Weapon Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=373)

</column>
name: Diomazul (The Serpent of Eighty Blades)
